name: Air Snooker
description:
Air Snooker is a billiard (pool) game, which is easy to play and is very attractive. This game support multi-player mode. It means that you can play with your friends and families. Plus, it kills time, when you are waiting for bus, or boring, this game is a best choice for you to play. Download this amazing game and try to win the game in the minimum time. Note that the score you got base on the time you spent for one round, plus, kick white ball in the hole will result in a low score. Note that you only have THREE chance to shoot the white ball into the hole.

How to play:
1. touch the cue ball and drag it to adjust cue angle
2. release your finger to shoot the cue ball
3. note that the longer distance you drag the cue ball, the more power will be applied to shoot the cue ball

Features:
- easy to play, suitable for all age
- various gorgeous table can be selected
- multi-player mode is support for you to play with your friends
- Game center is support to share your complete time with your friends
- easy to share your complete time to Facebook and Twitter
- more surprise is coming soon
